channel.title: How do i make it a diff color?
channel.description: i want to make the words whenever you open the store menu at the bottom there are those words how do i change those colors??. I looked for them in client.java but couldnt find them. so you think i could make a void or something to make the words a diff color?. I am also wanting to make the player options menu and options menu a diff color how would i do that??

item.title: How do i make it a diff color?
item.dc:creator: @hax3dup hax3dup
item.description:
@hax3dup wrote:

@red@
@yel@
@bla@
@blu@
@gre@
@pur@
@ora@

Thats how u make stuff different colors…
